jpo
Class AdvanceTimer

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      jpo.AdvanceTimer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class AdvanceTimer
extends java.lang.Thread

This class implements a Thread waits a period of time and then calls the method requestAdvance on it's calling object.

Field Summary
(package private)  AdvanceTimerInterface caller
          A reference back to the object that needs to be told to advance to the next picture.
private  int delaySeconds
          The amount of seconds to sleep.
private  boolean keepThreadRunning
          A variable to indicate that the thread should die.

          Constructor which should be called with the object to wake up and the delay this is to be done after.
 
Method Summary
 void run()
          The Thread method which sleeps and then advances the picture.

          A call to this method will exit the thread gracefully.

Field Detail

caller

AdvanceTimerInterface caller
A reference back to the object that needs to be told to advance to the next picture.

delaySeconds

private int delaySeconds
The amount of seconds to sleep.

keepThreadRunning

private boolean keepThreadRunning
A variable to indicate that the thread should die. Anything can write false to this variable and upon the next loop the thread wil exit gracefully.

Constructor Detail

AdvanceTimer

AdvanceTimer(AdvanceTimerInterface caller,
             int delaySeconds)
Constructor which should be called with the object to wake up and the delay this is to be done after.

Parameters:
caller - The object to wake up after the time is reached
delaySeconds - period to sleep

A call to this method will exit the thread gracefully.
